name: The EyePharmacy
overview: TheEyePharmacy.com, the Internet’s leading authoritative site dedicated solely to the eye provides valuable eye health information to the consumer and the professional, with timely, credible and reliable content - enabling one to take informed, confident steps toward improving your eye’s health and your life. TheEyePharmacy.com with its online communities ,forums and exhaustive Find-A-Doc directory focuses on supporting individuals who require instant access to relevant information pertaining to cataracts, glaucoma, LASIK, AMD, diabetes and more. The EyePharmacy.com enables the 60 million Americans in its core demographics and who are seeking information regarding their eyes access to its comprehensive and exhaustive video library in an easy to search format on categories including macular degeneration, cataract, LASIK, glaucoma, dry eye, eye infection, and allergies – amongst other related topics. The EyePharmacy.com with its state of the art designed website, including ecommerce with its strategic partners – includes its content library, its video library, and access to premier content via its free subscription model, blogs, discussion boards, advertising opportunities and more. The EyePharmacy.com has entered into several strategic partnerships with both for profit and not for profit organizations. The EyePharmacy.com founded in 2008, remains a private independent company today, based in New Jersey.
